code: import React from"react";import{StatsCardStyled,ListStyled,TitleStyled,ItemStyled}from"components/Statistics/Statistics.styled";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Statistics=_ref=>{let{statistics,title}=_ref;const getColor=label=>{switch(label){case".docx":return"#c12f2f";case".pdf":return"#538f29";case".mp3":return"#2f73c1";case".psd":return"#cdcd13";case".mp4":return"#c12fc1";default:break;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(StatsCardStyled,{children:[title&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TitleStyled,{children:title.toUpperCase()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListStyled,{children:statistics.map(i=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ItemStyled,{color:getColor(i.label),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:i.label}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[i.percentage,"%"]})]},i.id);})})]});};export default Statistics;
